channel.title: Romhacking on PacoChan's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Romhacking on PacoChan's Website

item.title: What's Shenmue (Dreamcast)
item.description: Translation made by Traducciones del Tío Víctor in collaboration with Shenmue Dojo.

item.title: Shenmue II (Dreamcast / Xbox)
item.description: Translation made by Traducciones del Tío Víctor.

item.title: Shenmue (Dreamcast)
item.description: Translation made by Traducciones del Tío Víctor in collaboration with SegaSaturno.

item.title: Tales of Vesperia (Xbox 360)
item.description: The latest translation of a Tales of game that we finished at Tales Translations.

item.title: Kirby's Adventure (NES)
item.description: Translation made in collaboration with Klint Proguctions in which I was in charge of the technical stuff, the romhacking itself.

item.title: Fragile Dreams (Wii)
item.description: Translation made by Traducciones del Tío Víctor in which I collaborated in texts translation, revision and map editing.

item.title: Resident Evil (GameBoy Color)
item.description: Resident Evil for GameBoy Color was cancelled at 90% of development and never released. But thanks to a fundraiser, the one that was holding two builds of this game, released them to the public.

item.title: The Legend of Zelda: Skyward Sword - Game-Breaking Bug Fix (Wii)
item.description: At a certain point toward the end of the Legend of Zelda Skyward Sword, while collecting pieces of a certain Song, you’re tasked with visiting the Fire, Water and Thunder Dragons in any order you choose.

item.title: Cheetahmen II (NES)
item.description: This game is infamous because it’s one of the worst games ever made. It’s full of all sorts of glitches and it’s extremely hard because of it’s glitched gameplay.

item.title: Tales of Destiny (PlayStation)
item.description: This translation was released after the Tales of the Abyss one and it took no less than three years.

item.title: Mario Party (Nintendo 64)
item.description: Long time ago I began translating this game to Spanish, when I was still a newbie in the romhacking scene, coding, etc.

item.title: Tales of the Abyss (PlayStation 2)
item.description: Another translation of the series by the team at Tales Translations. A huge project that ended up 100% translated, including images and video subtitles.

item.title: Banjo-Kazooie (Nintendo 64)
item.description: I started this project in 2009 with the help of Garin as proofreader. Being a big fand of the old Rare, I loved translating this game.

item.title: Tales of Eternia (PlayStation / PSP)
item.description: This is the first translation we did at Tales Translations.

item.title: Super Mario 64 (Nintendo 64)
item.description: I started this project long ago but I abandoned it. I won’t resume it, mainly because three reasons…
